list.name: Changes
list.comment: - Added: 1. New page & endpoint for category changing - Small view & logic fixes -

task.summary: Default task
Saving changes before switching to repositories: Added header & footer
work progress commit
work progress commit
added .gitignore

- Added: 1. Mechanism for adding categories: 1.1 Category entity, repository, service 1.2 HTML files of category addition pages 1.3 Get/post methods in AssortmentController. 2. Mechanism for displaying products from the DB. - Fixed (Changed): 1. data type Id -> long; 2. Entities -> ...Entities 3. other minor changes - Deleted: 1. unnecessary files (used earlier for training)
Added: 1. ProductDTO; 2. pager.html (display only, no functionality) 3. Pagination (dividing the resulting product list) Fixed: small modifications
Added: 1. functionality of pagination

Added: - Blocks of views: 1.1. categoryFilter.html 1.2. indexView.html 2. Page of products filtered by category (indexCategory.html) 3. new methods by filtration by category in ProductRepository & ProductService 4. Counting the number of page method
- Fixed: 1. Split controllers Assortment & Category
- Changed: 1. method index in AssortmentController.java (for filtering by category. it works if you pass the "categoryId" parameter manually. it doesn't display the whole list - it needs to be finished)
Added: Functional of Category filter
Small view fixes
Added ProductPageDTO.java for to analyze the approach
- Added: 1. Functional of product changing: 1.1. update method in ProductRepository 1.2. new logic of update method in ProductService - Fixed: 1. Bugs in products adding & changing

- Added: 1. pom.xml dependencies for using MapStruct 2. CategoryMapper & ProductMapper for using MapStruct
- Changed: 1. ProductDTO: Class field Long categoryId -> CategoryEntity category. 2. ProductService: Corrections with using MapStruct. 3. CategoryController: Corrections with using MapStruct. 4. AssortmentController: Corrections with using MapStruct.
- Small fixes

- Added : 1. UserDTO, CategoryDTO 2. UserMapper 3. All user page all.html 4. User show page showUser.html 5. Links to registration & log-in pages in header.html 6. Link to all user page in homepage.html 7. Logic of registration 8. Logic of updating users information (not full)
- Small Fixes -

- Added : 1. Logic of updating users information (full)
- Small Fixes -
- Added : 1. View for logic of updating users information
- Fixed: 1. Pagination methods in ProductService now process ProductDTO objects.

- Added: 1. Pagination in All users view
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. E-mail validation on registration page 2. User search by email
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. Functional of product searching (not correct, but work) - will be corrected
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. WebSecurityConfig & MyUserDetailsService for authorization
- Changed: 1. pom.xml dependencies 2. logins endpoints moved to LoginController.java 3. view of header.html (Anonymous user or not) 4. annotations of access control restrictions in CategoryController
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. WebSecurityConfig & MyUserDetailsService for authorization
- Changed: 1. pom.xml dependencies 2. logins endpoints moved to LoginController.java 3. view of header.html (Anonymous user or not) 4. annotations of access control restrictions in CategoryController
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. annotations of access control limits in AssortmentController.java & UserController.java 2. access control fixes in homepage.html , indexView.html, show.html - Changed: 1. Correcting the view in the files: show.html, editProduct.html, addProduct.html, homepage.html, indexView.html, show.html
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. Logout logic: 1.1. Settitns in WebSecurityConfig. 1.2. GET method "/logout" in LoginController. 1.3. confirmLogout.html 1.4. link to confirmation of logout in header.html
- Small fixes -
- Fixed: 1. display sizes of all html
- Fixed: 1. Separating controllers by destination 2. Email validation bug
trying to set up a login saving progress (why the message is not displayed when you log in - figure it out)

- Added: 1. Functional of password changing
- Changed: 1. the button and the field for changing the password are on a separate page changePassword.html 2. controllers were created for the page changePassword.html
- Small view fixes -

- Added: 1. adding and changing address functionality: 1.1. editAddress.html 1.2. addAddress.html 1.3. AddressDTO.java 1.4. AddressMapper.java 1.5. AddressRepository.java 1.6. new method in AddressService.java 1.7. new button in editUser.html
- Small view fixes -

- Added: 1. correcting address functionality: 1.1. CorrectAddress.html 1.2. new method in AddressRepository.java 1.3. new method in AddressService.java 1.4. new button in editUser.html 1.5. new endpoints in AddressController.java
- Small fixes -

- Changed: Endpoints names in AddressController.java, AssortmentController.java, RegistrationController.java UserController.java
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. New buttons on all products page (More information + buy now).
- Changed: 1. Updated mechanism of product searching. 2. Annotations RequestMapping GET/POST -> GetMapping/ PostMapping everywhere. 3. Fixed buttons of pagination. 4. Fixed all Query methods in all Repositories (parameters changed from "?" to ":param".
- Small fixes -

- Changed: 1. Fixed pager bugs
- Small fixes -

- Changed: 1. deleted useless files indexView.html, indexByTitle.html, indexCategory.html 2. functionality from the deleted pages has been moved to index.html
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. Session cart functionality 1.1. Cart.java class for session storage of cart 1.2. CartController.java 1.3. cart.html 1.4. Button "Add to Cart" in show.html
- Changed: 1. Link to cart in header.html 2. Deleted Button "Add to Cart" from index.html
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1.The development of the ordering process has begun: Added: 1.1. OrderController.java 1.2. OrderRepository.java 1.3. OrderEntity.java 1.4. OrderDTO.java 1.5. OrderMapper.java 1.6. Enums: DeliveryMethod.java, OrderStatus.java, PaymentMethod.java PaymentStatus.java 1.7. Ordering page (newOrderPage.html) it is now empty.
- Changed: 1. Cart view: added request to log in before ordering.
- Small fixes -

- Bug fixes: 1. fixed functional of products deleting from the cart (changed type of index in CartController.java) 2.fixed the relationship between OrderEntity.java & ProductEntity.java
- Changed: 1. Color of header.html
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. Method setDTO in AddressMapper.java 2. Total price field in cart.html 3. Evaluating of total price in CartController.java 4. confirmNewOrderPage.html fields
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. Separate access to user profile settings: 1.1. endpoint separation in all controllers 1.2. logic separation in all views
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. Order functionality by client 2. Icons in header
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. All orders page(allOrder.html) & method in OrderController.java + new pager in pager.html 2. Show order page(showOrder.html) & method in OrderController.java 3. Edit order page(editOrder.html) & methods in OrderController.java + method in OrderService.java + method in OrderRepository.java 4. cart cleaning after ordering
- Small fixes -

- Added: 1. All orders page for clients (allUserOrder.html) & method in OrderController.java + methods in OrderService.java & OrderRepository.java + new pager in pager.html 2. Show order page for clients( changed showOrder.html) & method in OrderController.java
- Small view & logic fixes -

- Added: 1. Blue buttons on every page
- Small view & logic fixes -

- Fixed: 1. Connection between OrderEntity & ProductEntity
- Small view & logic fixes -

- Added: 1. Display product list in cards 2. Image field in product show page.
- Small view & logic fixes -

- Added: 1. Description field in product entity / DTO / service / repository // add / edit / show pages.
- Small view & logic fixes -

- Added: 1. Links to index in category in all category page
- Small view & logic fixes -
- Small view & logic fixes -
- Added: 1. New page & endpoint for category changing - Small view & logic fixes -
